item.title: RPG Combat Kata
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I saw these tweets (in Spanish): As I respect enormously Modesto and Xabi’s opinion and I trust on the skills of a Carlos Ble’s apprentice, I decided to do the kata at home. And as I keep trying to learn F#, that would be the chosen language. I recommend you to do the kata, is a very interesting one. In case you want to do it, please stop reading now and come back when you have finished it, as I’m going to explain how I solved it.
